```{r}
#| label: sol-load-package
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```



1. How many different types of CSD (`csd_type`) are there in the dataset?

```{r}
#| label: sol-00-01
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show code"

towny %>%
  count(csd_type)
```

2. What is the proportion of each type of CSD?

```{r}
#| label: sol-00-02
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show code"

towny %>%
  count(csd_type) %>%
  mutate(p = n / sum(n))
```

3. What is the proportion of each status within type of CSD?

```{r}
#| label: sol-00-03
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show code"

towny %>%
  count(csd_type, status) %>%
  group_by(csd_type) %>%
  mutate(p = n / sum(n))
```
